useCase.name: Student reserves a book
useCase.description: As a student, I want to reserve a book in the library.

preconditions.precondition: Student is logged in to the library system.
Student has searched for a specific book.

failureEndConditions.condition: Reservation process fails due to system error.

useCase.trigger: Student clicks on the reserve book button.

mainSequence.step: Monitor displays the library page after successful login.
Student clicks on the reserve book button.
